title: FS Set of 6 1897 Baltimore Herald clippings Boston Beaneaters team including Chick St
author: Michael McGuffin

posts.post_title: FS Set of 6 1897 Baltimore Herald clippings Boston Beaneaters team including Chick St
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a set of 6 original 1897 Boston Beaneaters clippings from the Baltimore Herald.  Included are 

Chick Stahl
E.M Lewis
James Sullivan 
George Yeager
J.E. Stivers
E.L Lake

I can email photos, contact at 

[url]michael.mcguffin@hotmail.com[/url] 

Take all 6 for 50 shipped PayPal gift

Or will trade for any M116 commons graded or any raw poor condition w600s
